subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Is this group defunct?
msgSnippet: ... Would you please? The more copies we have distributed among different Quickscript users, the better. On Jul 19, 2017, at 9:18 AM, moira.obrien@gmail.com
messageBody:
On Jul 19, 2017, at 9:18 AM, moira.obrien@... [Read_Alphabet] <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

[…]

Because the correspondence circle was one where every letter went to every person, and when it returned to oneself, one replace one's last letter with a new one, and in those days (the late 60's) it was not so easy to make copies, i only have a few letters from KR which were sent direct to me.  However, I do have this correspondence and will be happy to share with the group on request and in due course.



Would you please? The more copies we have distributed among different Quickscript users, the better.
